metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2839 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Zephyr Project Manager WordPress plugin before 3.2.55 does not have anyauthorisation as well as CSRF in all its AJAX actions, allowingunauthenticated users to call them either directly or via CSRF attacks.Furthermore, due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping, it could alsoallow them to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks against logged inadmins.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
zephyr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
